## Protocol.CSS.CSSRule interface

CSS rule representation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CSSRule 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [media](./puppeteer.protocol.css.cssrule.media.md) | [CSSMedia](./puppeteer.protocol.css.cssmedia.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Media list array (for rules involving media queries). The array enumerates media queries starting with the innermost one, going outwards. |
|  [origin](./puppeteer.protocol.css.cssrule.origin.md) | [StyleSheetOrigin](./puppeteer.protocol.css.stylesheetorigin.md) | Parent stylesheet's origin. |
|  [selectorList](./puppeteer.protocol.css.cssrule.selectorlist.md) | [SelectorList](./puppeteer.protocol.css.selectorlist.md) | Rule selector data. |
|  [style](./puppeteer.protocol.css.cssrule.style.md) | [CSSStyle](./puppeteer.protocol.css.cssstyle.md) | Associated style declaration. |
|  [styleSheetId](./puppeteer.protocol.css.cssrule.stylesheetid.md) | [StyleSheetId](./puppeteer.protocol.css.stylesheetid.md) | The css style sheet identifier (absent for user agent stylesheet and user-specified stylesheet rules) this rule came from. |
